All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionPhase
Manages the game's Action Phase in normal and expert Variants.
ActionPhaseState
Models the abstract and most general ActionPhase state, keeping track of the "context" class.
ActionPhaseStateTest
This class test the ActionPhaseStateType methods
ActionPhaseStateType
Action Phase states are of five types, this enum sums up these types.
ActionPhaseTest
This class test the ActionPhase methods
AlertSceneController
This class implements the controller of a generic Alert Scene.
AssistantCard
Represents the so-called "Assistant Cards" in the game
AssistantCardTest
This class test the AssistantCard methods
Bag
Models game's Student bag.
BagTest
This class test the Bag methods
CardCharacterizations
Lists the singular characterizations of the characters.
CharacterCard
Abstract Action Phase State, this class manages all common traits of character cards, like characterizations, price, activation ecc...
CharacterCardFabric
Class used while creating the Action phase to draw the three character cards at the start of the play, and fabricates them.
CharacterCardFabricTest
This class test the CharacterCardFabric methods
CharacterCardTest
This class test the CharacterCard methods
Characters
Enums all 12 characters of the game. referring to the player's handbook the order is: FRIAR, HOST, CRIER, MESSENGER, SORCERESS, CENTAUR, JESTER, KNIGHT, SORCERER, MINSTREL, QUEEN, THIEF.
CharactersLookup
Maps every character with his type.
CharactersTest
This class test the Character methods
Cli
This class offers a Command Line User Interface.
CliClientApp
This class is the Client Cli launcher.
Client
Abstract class to communicate with the server.
ClientController
Controls the client reading and managing all not Play messages and forwarding them to the PlayMessageController class.
ClientHandler
Interface to handle clients.
ClientInputStream
This class manages CLI's input stream in a separate thread from the out stream, so that the out stream and the input stream can work independently without waiting for each other.
Cloud
Models game's Cloud.
CloudTest
This class test the Cloud methods
Commands
This class translates String Play commands to method calls, checking for data correctness, and fixing Case errors.
ConnectSceneController
This class implements the scene where users connect to the server.
Eriantys
Main Game class, called while starting program execution.
ErrorMessage
Message to notify an error to the user.
EscapeCli
This enum contains all Escape characters used in the cli.
ExpertPlayMessage
Class which manages all Expert variant play messages.
Finalize
5th state of Action phase, this class models the choice and use of a cloud.
FinalizeTest
This class test the Finalize methods
Game
Class which represents the whole game model and manages all its components.
GameControllerTest
 
GameManager
This class manages all client-server communication not directly regarding the game.
GameModel
This class manages all interactions between model and controller and handles model exceptions.
GameModelException
every kind of exception gets catched GameModel and forwarded like this exception.
GameModelTest
This class test the GameModel methods
GameState
Used only in Controller to keep track of the general state of the game.
GameTest
This class test the Game methods
GenericMessage
Simple type of message that sends messages as a String.
GenericSceneController
Represents the generic Scene controller.
Gui
This class offers a Graphical User Interface.
GuiClientApp
Main JavaFX class which starts the main stage and scene.
IllegalMessageException
Exception thrown by those classes that manage messages and cannot run what they received.
InboundController
Of the controller this class manages model's inbound communications, checking if those commands are runnable or not if not runnable an exception will be raised to be caught by the PlayMessagesReader class
Influence
3rd Action phase state, this class models the game's influence calc.
InfluenceCard
3rd type of Character card, this card decors the action phase's Influence State, modelling all influence calc related character card behaviours.
InfluenceCardTest
This class test the InfluenceCard methods, character cards who modify influence
InfluenceTest
This class test the Influence methods
InputController
This Class, with the help of the TurnController class gives methods to check if communications between controller and model are legal or not
Island
Models game's Island.
IslandTest
This class test the Island methods
LobbyMessage
This class manages all messages in the Lobby client server dialogue.
LobbyMessageReader
All LobbyMessage readers need to implement this interface.
LobbySceneController
This class implements the scene where players wait for other players to join the game.
LoginMessage
Class implements all messages used in the login phase of the communication between client and server, that that is from establishing connection and sending the name.
LoginSceneController
This class implements the scene where users choose their nicknames.
MenuSceneController
This class implements the main menu scene.
MergeIsland
4th Action Phase State, this class models the merging of the islands.
MergeIslandTest
This class test the MergeIsland methods
Message
Manages common traits of the messages between client and server and viceversa.
MessageTest
 
MessageType
Lists all particular types of message available.
MotherNature
Models game's mother nature wood peace with a singleton pattern.
MotherNatureCard
2nd type of Character card, this card decors the action phase's MotherNatureState State, modelling all mother nature related character card behaviours.
MotherNatureCardTest
This class test the MotherNatureCard methods, character cards who modify mother nature
MotherNatureState
2nd Action phase state, This class models mother nature's movements through the islands.
MotherNatureStateTest
This class test the MotherNatureState methods
MotherNatureTest
This class test the MotherNature methods
NormalPlayMessage
Class which manages all Play related messages.
Observable
 
Observer
Observer interface.
OtherMessagesTest
 
OutboundController
Class used by the Play Message reader to read status informations from the model.
PingMessage
Message used to keep the connection alive.
PlanningPhase
Models games Planning phase and manages play rounds and phases.
PlanningPhaseTest
This class test the PlanningPhase methods
Player
Represents a player of the game which makes moves and controls his game Dashboard
PlayersNumberSceneController
This class implements the Player number and expert variant choose scene
PlayerTest
This class test the Player methods
PlayMessage
Manages all common traits of NormalPlayMessage and ExpertPlayMessage, their memory and their execution
PlayMessageController
This class is run by the executeMessage method of the received PlayMessage to change the PlayState class, and by the view when she needs to send (Normal or Expert) PlayMessages to the server.
PlayMessageReader
Every class which "reads" play messages needs to implement this interface.
PlayMessagesFabric
Fabric class needed to build Play messages.
PlayMessagesReader
Of the controller this is the middle part.
PlaySceneController
This class implements the Play view.
PlayState
Class which saves the state of the game in client.
SceneController
This class implements the controller of a generic scene.
SchoolDashboard
Models private Player's dashboard, keeping track of entrance, room and towers.
SchoolDashboardTest
This class test the SchoolDashboard methods
SchoolEntrance
Models School Entrance part of the player's dashboard.
SchoolRoom
Models School Room part of the Player's Dashboard, keeping also track of the teachers.
SchoolRoomTest
This class test the SchoolRoom methods
Server
Main server class that starts a socket server.
ServerApp
Server loader class, Eriantys class calls this class to launch the server.
SocketClient
This class represents a socket client implementation.
SocketClientHandler
Socket implementation of the ClientHandler interface.
SocketServer
Socket server that handles all the new socket connection.
StartSceneController
Implements the start scene
StatePrinter
This class has the job to read PlayState's class content and generate a string to print to the user representing client's actual game state.
StudentMovement
1st Action Phase State, this class models the movement of a student between places and the subsequent capturing of teachers by a player.
StudentMovementCard
1st type of Character card, this card decors the action phase's StudentMovement State, modelling all student movement related character card behaviours.
StudentMovementCardTest
This class test the StudentMovementCard methods, character cards who modify student movement
StudentMovementTest
This class test the StudentMovement methods
StudentsContainer
Used by those character cards which keep a student memory.
StudentsContainerTest
This class test the StudentsContainer methods
StudentsManager
Lots of pieces and entities in the game keep memory of students, this class gets extended by all classes that manage students.
StudentsManagerTest
This class test the StudentsManager methods
Table
Models game's table, so everything that is set on the table while playing the game: bags, clouds and islands (excluding player's dashboard).
TableTest
This class test the Table methods
TeacherColor
Enums all five Teacher colors
TowerColor
Enums all three tower colors
TurnController
This class keeps track of the turns of the players
View
Defines a generic view to be implemented by each view type There are two types of players: the main player, the first to connect to the game, which defines the games settings, and the normal player who defines only his customization
ViewObservable
Custom observable class that can be observed by implementing the ViewObserver interface and registering as listener.
ViewObserver
 
VirtualView
For the Game Manager there is a one-to-one correspondence between client and virtual view.
WinSceneController
This class implements the scene which shows that a player has won the game.
Wizard
Enums all four wizards
WizardSceneController
This class implements the controller of the scene where users pick their own color.
